text: My daughter truly enjoys attending this school, and she especially loves the two teachers. They are dedicated, responsible, and make learning fun and engaging. My daughter often tells me how much she enjoys going to school, and the children get along very well with one another. This is a kindergarten I highly recommend.

We started to enroll our daughter to TMC05 since we moved to here.

My daughter started from N1 and she is now is K1 this year.

She didn’t love school from the start mainly because of the separate anxiety. But with the teacher patiently and love , my girl was adapting the school very soon. And now she looked forward to going to school and knowing what to expect each day.

Every staff person we met was polite, professional and friendly. Administration was wonderful and accessible.

And also I would like to take this opportunity to these teachers that my child transited through~
Teacher Rina, Zhuang Laoshi, Ms Jen, Cheng Laoshi, Ms Joey, Cikgu Su and Li Laoshi. Thank you being so patient, love, caring towards my daughter.

We are so grateful that we managed to enrol our kids to this centre. The principal and teachers were friendly and approachable. We are thankful to Teacher Pauline and Wang Laoshi for always being patient handling my kids. Kudos to Teacher Irene too for always greet and cheer my kids up early in the morning with her cheerful vibe. Kudos Teachers! We are so lucky to have you guys in the centre.

My son been going to MFS Greenverge since March 2024, from N1 onwards. The teachers are very patient, caring and keep children engaged through out lesson times! My son look forward to going to school everyday. Special shout out to teacher Ivy, my son adores her and I have seen her caring for each and every child there with a big smile always. They helped entirely with potty training of my child too. They didn’t give up when I did. Thank you teacher Ivy and Lau Shi!

We’ve had a wonderful experience. The staff are kind and attentive. Teacher Irene and He Lao Shi are very involved with the kids. Can see the effort they put in in caring for the kids.

We’ve seen great progress in our child’s learning and social skills.

Keep it up!
